response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration of its value and your potential needs, we propose a special offer for this exceptional item. We believe it would be a perfect fit for you and aligns well with your expectations. Our offer for the product is $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also includes exclusive benefits and services designed to enhance your experience. We hope you find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing how this product can add significant value to your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
